# all

**Type Property**

A list of all points of interest categories, both included and excluded.

## Declaration

```swift
static var all: PointOfInterestCategories { get }
```

## Categories to include or exclude

- **excludingAll**: A list of point of interest categories to exclude from display on the map.

items.description: A list of point of interest categories to exclude from display on the map.
